properties.description: Add green paint to bike lane in intersection
properties.municipality: Green paint added to alert people driving to the potential presence of people cycling on Murray St at Ioco Rd both eastbound and westbound (Summer 2020).

properties.location: Port Moody, in front of Moody Station
properties.description: There are lots of potholes on the official bike route in front of Moody Station, right at the intersection of Williams and Spring Street.
properties.municipality: Numerous potholes at the intersection of Williams and Spring repaired with re-paving (Summer 2020).

properties.location: Forest Park Way, north of David Ave
properties.description: This designated bike route lacks shared lane markings. Please install sharrows.
properties.municipality: To be included in road marking program for 2021 - Summer 2021

properties.description: Add green paint to get across Ioco at Murray. Thanks BTW for all the paint around Suter Brook :-)
properties.municipality: Green paint added to connect curb bike lane to floating bike lane across turning lane north bound on Ioco before Murray, and green paint added across slip lane after Murray. No green paint added in the southbound direction at this time, however, we will consider this for the future. (Summer 2020)

properties.location: Suter Brook trail from Murray Street to City Hall/ Rec Center parking lot
properties.description: Add a curb cut at the City Hall end. The big bump into the City Hall parking lot is hard when my kid is in a child seat, or if there is a lot of shopping cargo on my bike. This change would improve the overall accessibility of this handy and under-rated little trail.
properties.municipality: This is not a formal bike route but we will review if a small ramp can be added as it does provide a connection to a bike route (Review to be completed spring 2021)

properties.description: Repair bike lane in front of Moody Station
properties.municipality: Road repaved between Hugh and Williams, repairing potholes in the bike route (Summer 2020)

properties.description: Repair potholes in bike lane. Currently forces people cycling into the driving lane
Trim bushes/shrubs out of bike lane. People cycling currently need to detour into the driving lane to avoid
